abstract: Investors sought safety in government debt and gold as the latest job report raised fears that corporate profits will weaken.
snippet: Investors sought safety in government debt and gold as the latest job report raised fears that corporate profits will weaken.
lead_paragraph: Shares fell sharply yesterday and investors sought safety in government debt after a Labor Department report showed an abrupt drop in employment in August and raised fears of a recession.

headline.main: Stocks Tumble as Job Report Leads Investors to Shift to Bonds
headline.print_headline: Stocks Tumble as Job Report Leads Investors to Shift to Bonds
